title: Barter For My Bride
description: She's heartbroken, trying to forget.But it isn’t working.Elia returns to Ukraine to see if daredevil dancer Misha will start over as friends. The last time she was with him she fell too hard, too fast.With her entire future at stake, she needs to slow her heart and listen to her head.Misha has other ideas. He overwhelms her with love and charms her with their colorful, ancient traditions. Courtship has never been like this before! She is transformed, awash with passion, eager for more.However, the creamy center of anything delicious can only be enjoyed if you break through tough shells.Disapproval from Misha’s mischievous mother and village bullies are only the start.What happens when friends, family, and lovers draw battle lines of fear, envy and obsession—on all sides?Find out in Barter for My Bride, a clean contemporary romance, the sequel to Daredevil Dancer.
author: Carollyne Lairie
